summary:
2 mods
mod 1/ Change Auriel set and dawnbreaker colors / change la couleur du set Auriel et d\'aubeclat
mod 2/ increases bow and sword stats like daedric weapons / ameliore les stats de l\'arc et de l\'epee equivalent aux armes daedric
descriptionHtml:
[center]

2 little mods made for my personal use, but i can share ..
2 petits mod fait pour moi même, mais je peux partager ..

I like ebony set and dawnbreaker/auriel, so made for matching whis ebony.(not inclued).
j\'aime bien le set d\'ebene et aubeclat + matos auriel, donc j\'ai fais ces mod pour que ça concorde.

Install : use nmm or extract to Data folder
Installation : utiliser NMM ou extraire dans le dossier Data.

--------------------------------------------------------------
Mes autres creations : 
My others creations :

Ebony sexy female UNP and standalone ebony Circlet 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32697][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/ebony/miniebony.jpg[/img][/url]

Nellie redguard follower (tank with Dovakhiin shout) + savegame lvl1
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30946][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/Nellie/Nellie_min.jpg[/img][/url]

Eliween follower (archer follower lvl 1 -> 100)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24525][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/Eliween2min.jpg[/img][/url]

Aela more pretty (change Aela face)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24170][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/Aela2min.jpg[/img][/url]

Lydia more pretty (change Lydia face)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24176][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/lydia1min.jpg[/img][/url]

Personnal homage to Liv Tyler :)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/137810][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/Skyrim_%20liv_t_miniature.jpg[/img][/url]

Princess of the woods addons and alternative sexy textures
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24310][img]http://didmaster.free.fr/divers/SkyrilASE_link.jpg[/img][/url]

--------------------------------------------

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

Thanks all users and modders !
[/center]
author: Elidid
